Protocols/AnyImage.html#/s:3Imp8AnyImage.name: image
Protocols/AnyImage.html#/s:3Imp8AnyImage.abstract: An UIImage that’s managed by the current instance. If no UIImage exists yet, it will be fetched synchronously on access.

Extensions/UIImageView.html#/s:So11UIIma.name: setImage(_:)
Extensions/UIImageView.html#/s:So11UIIma.abstract: Updates UIImageView with a provided Image object.

Extensions/UIButton.html#/s:So8UIButtonC.name: setImage(_:for:)
Extensions/UIButton.html#/s:So8UIButtonC.abstract: Updates UIButton with a provided Image object.

Classes/URLImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp16U.name: url
Classes/URLImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp16U.abstract: An URL of the image to be fetched.

Classes/URLImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp16U.name: init(url:)
Classes/URLImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp16U.abstract: Initializes a new provider object with specified URL.

Classes/URLImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp16U.name: fetchImage()
Classes/URLImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp16U.abstract: Returns an UIImage instance referenced by the URL provider was initialized with. Works synchronously.

Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.name: name
Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.abstract: A name of the image to be fetched.

Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.name: bundleIdentifier
Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.abstract: An identifier of a bunlde from which image will be fetched.

Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.name: init(name:bundle:)
Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.abstract: Initializes a new provider object with specified image name.

Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.name: fetchImage()
Classes/NamedImageProvider.html#/s:3Imp1.abstract: Returns an UIImage instance referenced by the name provider was initialized with.

Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html#/.name: cgImage
Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html#/.abstract: A CGImage instance managed by the provider.

Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html#/.name: init(cgImage:)
Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html#/.abstract: Initializes a new provider object with CGImage instance.

Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html#/.name: fetchImage()
Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html#/.abstract: Returns an UIImage instance that uses a CGImage provided as a backing storage.

Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.name: size
Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.abstract: A size of the image that will be generated.

Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.name: colorSpace
Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.abstract: A colorspace that will be used for drawing.

Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.name: init(size:colorSpace:actions:)
Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.abstract: Initializes a new provider object with specified size, colorspace and drawing actions. See fetchImage().

Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.name: fetchImage()
Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html#.abstract: Returns an UIImage instance by creating a CGContext with a given size / colorspace

Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageC8provid.name: provider
Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageC8provid.abstract: An object that’s used for UIImage fetching.

Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageC5imageS.name: image
Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageC5imageS.abstract: An UIImage that’s managed by the current instance. If no UIImage exists yet, it will be fetched synchronously on access.

Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A05Na.name: init(named:in:)
Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A05Na.abstract: Initializes a new Image object with URLImageProvider.

Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A16UR.name: init(url:)
Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A16UR.abstract: Initializes a new Image object with URLImageProvider.

Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A012C.name: init(cgImage:)
Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A012C.abstract: Initializes a new Image object with CoreGraphicsImageProvider.

Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A013B.name: init(size:colorSpace:actions:)
Classes/Image.html#/s:3Imp5ImageCA2A013B.abstract: Initializes a new Image object with BitmapContextImageProvider.

Classes/Image.html.name: Image
Classes/Image.html.abstract: An object that controls UIImage lifecycle and storage.

Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html.name: BitmapContextImageProvider
Classes/BitmapContextImageProvider.html.abstract: An object that generates image based on provided draw actions.

Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html.name: CoreGraphicsImageProvider
Classes/CoreGraphicsImageProvider.html.abstract: An object that wraps and manages storage of CGImage objects.

Classes/NamedImageProvider.html.name: NamedImageProvider
Classes/NamedImageProvider.html.abstract: An object that fetches images from the bundle storage.

Classes/URLImageProvider.html.name: URLImageProvider
Classes/URLImageProvider.html.abstract: An object that fetches images from the specified URL.
